name: Nano
devDescDetail: I am a front-end developer who loves to use modern technologies, I can also write APIs on the back-end side by simply using the Nodejs ecosystem. I do these things with a bachelor's degree in computer science and technology. I say Chinese natively, and also say English & Japanese at a limited level.
